******************************
* Env command lines e.g.     *
******************************


[ Adding a new environment ]

    Adding/refreshing environment to a project
    ----------

    To add a new environment or to refresh an existing one, use the following command line.

    $ gina env:add <env_name> @<project_name>
    
    
    Adding/refreshing environment to a bundle
    ----------
    
    $ gina env:add <bundle_name>/<env_name> @<project_name>


[ Removing an existing environments ]

    $ gina env:remove <env_name> @<project_name>


[ Listing all environments inside your project ]

    $ gina env:list @<project_name>

    or to list all projects environments

    $ gina env:list
